result.title: SPICE video promo
result.description: 45” promo video presenting, in layman language, the project objectives. The clip will focus on the main aim of the SPICE project which is to develop tools and methods to support Citizen Curation, in which citizens actively engage in curatorial activities in order to learn more about themselves and develop a better understanding of, and empathy for, other communities.
